New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2023 年 10 月 15 日星期日 12:17:07 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Pro-Palestinian supporters ‘black out’ Auckland Museum after it lights up in support of Israel, police called out https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pro-palestinian-supporters-black-out-auckland-museum-after-it-lights-up-in-support-of-israel/ZJPSCSFBJNG7XLIADWGRUUYEYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pro-palestinian-supporters-black-out-auckland-museum-after-it-lights-up-in-support-of-israel/ZJPSCSFBJNG7XLIADWGRUUYEYY/ The lights have now been turned off at the museum Sun, 15 Oct 2023 10:21:12 +0000 Pro-Palestinian supporters are protesting the museum’s decision to light blue and white in solidarity with Israel.
Dog falls into grave at Auckland funeral moments before coffin is lowered https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dog-falls-into-grave-at-auckland-funeral-moments-before-coffin-is-lowered/AB7MWL2OPVECDAY4ZO7RQVGHE4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dog-falls-into-grave-at-auckland-funeral-moments-before-coffin-is-lowered/AB7MWL2OPVECDAY4ZO7RQVGHE4/ The incident was captured on video and quickly went viral on social media. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 07:24:20 +0000 Cochise the dog slipped on the green matting after being let off his leash by a child.
Arrests made during Ruakākā homicide investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/arrests-made-during-ruakaka-homicide-investigation/N6I5NSYPMREGVFQJVCTOO76OLM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/arrests-made-during-ruakaka-homicide-investigation/N6I5NSYPMREGVFQJVCTOO76OLM/ Two men have been charged with firearm-related offences. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 07:16:05 +0000 Police were called at 4.08am to find a man lying dead on Peter Snell Rd in Ruakākā. Photo / Tania Whyte
Election 2023: Eight Pasifika voices likely in new Parliament https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/election-2023-eight-pasifika-voices-likely-in-new-parliament/XTJYGCCBPZEJVK7JETDLBJ72HI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/election-2023-eight-pasifika-voices-likely-in-new-parliament/XTJYGCCBPZEJVK7JETDLBJ72HI/ Aaron RyanMajority of Pasifika representatives are in Labour; one's in National and two are Greens. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 06:49:47 +0000 The people fighting for the Pacific in Aotearoa. Photo / Whakaata Māori
Elon Musk congratulates National’s Christopher Luxon on election win https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elon-musk-congratulates-nationals-christopher-luxon-on-election-win/WM5FFYGQTZCSJPWKIYNOTXLRQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elon-musk-congratulates-nationals-christopher-luxon-on-election-win/WM5FFYGQTZCSJPWKIYNOTXLRQ4/ Amy WigginsBusiness magnate Elon Musk has celebrated National's election win online. Did the pollsters get it right in the 2023 election? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/did-the-pollsters-get-it-right-in-election-2023/CLZMOEYHO5DNNKJQQBRYLVPX7Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/did-the-pollsters-get-it-right-in-election-2023/CLZMOEYHO5DNNKJQQBRYLVPX7Q/ Alex SpenceRecent polls were broadly accurate on party shares. The surprise was in the electorates. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 06:00:00 +0000 National's party vote share was slightly higher than recent polls indiciated. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Weather: Strong wind gusts over 110km/h cancel six flights in and out of Wellington Airport https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-strong-wind-gusts-over-110kmh-cancel-six-flights-in-and-out-of-wellington-airport/OPW6MIV3C5EVNB3TZU57WR75LI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-strong-wind-gusts-over-110kmh-cancel-six-flights-in-and-out-of-wellington-airport/OPW6MIV3C5EVNB3TZU57WR75LI/ Benjamin PlummerYesterday, strong winds also affected flights in and out of Christchurch Airport. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:31:53 +0000 Six flights in and out of Wellington Airport have been cancelled today due to strong winds. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Election 2023: National’s Scott Simpson retains Coromandel seat in landslide https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/election-2023-nationals-scott-simpson-retains-coromandel-seat-in-landslide/UD5X63MP2BH6DFDRJCB4U4DXJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/election-2023-nationals-scott-simpson-retains-coromandel-seat-in-landslide/UD5X63MP2BH6DFDRJCB4U4DXJA/ Jim BirchallNational MP Scott Simpson remains the MP for Coromandel. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:26:20 +0000 Scott Simpson convincingly retained the Coromandel seat on election night.
Mongrel Mob, Black Power tensions flare in Gisborne: New police operation Medial launched to keep community safe https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-black-power-tensions-flare-in-gisborne-new-police-operation-medial-launched-to-keep-community-safe/KIGQBR3LGBBCXKRMNTQ7QL5VL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mongrel-mob-black-power-tensions-flare-in-gisborne-new-police-operation-medial-launched-to-keep-community-safe/KIGQBR3LGBBCXKRMNTQ7QL5VL4/ Raphael FranksOperation Medial lead Inspector Darren Paki mentioned recent drive-by shootings. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:04:53 +0000 On Friday evening, police got several calls reporting shootings in Gisborne, which allowed police to respond quickly and be prepared with information, Inspector Paki said - something he wanted more of from the new operation.
Whangārei and Northland electorates returned to National https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-and-northland-electorates-returned-to-national/QE24TRYJMCVVBJSTH2P5C5DC2A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-and-northland-electorates-returned-to-national/QE24TRYJMCVVBJSTH2P5C5DC2A/ Mike DinsdaleThere are lots of challenges ahead for the new MPs. Sun, 15 Oct 2023 05:01:17 +0000 The new Northland MP, National’s Grant McCallum (centre), celebrating with his children Jeremy (left) and Eve the morning after getting elected. Photo / Tania Whyte
